text:
Mano, sorry for keeping you waiting.
Aren't you cold?

Um... Producer-san, before we head back to the office,
can we stop by the park?

(Her singing voice is truly beautiful...
And... it's become even more powerful than when we first met...)

Um, thank you so much...
I wanted to share this place with you, Producer-san.

Oh, no,
thank you for sharing it with me.

That day, because you found me,
Producer-san, I was able to take a step forward.

Meeting Hiori-chan and Meguru-chan,
I've been able to discover parts of myself I never knew...

Thank you for everything.
I want to keep doing my best from now on.

So, Producer-san...
Will you keep watching over me... forever?

Oh, of course...!
I'll support Illumination STARS to soar even higher...!

Yes. I want to fly higher and higher,
no matter how far it takes me.
